message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll compromise a little. Let's meet in the middle. This is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm willing to take a chance that you'll come around to seeing things my way.
Okay, Bob, I'm getting a little nervous about inflation.  Let's make a deal before it eats away too much of my share.  I'm willing to give you a little more this time, but that's my final offer.
I can see you're getting nervous, but I'm not budging. You'll have to do better than that if you want a deal.
Okay, Bob.  I'm getting desperate now.  I'm willing to give you a bit more. This is my absolute final offer.
You said that was your absolute final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll take an even worse deal rather than risk getting nothing.
